statements: SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_url FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_url, asset_name, asset_type FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_id = 2;
SELECT asset_name, asset_metadata FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_id = 3;
SELECT asset_id, asset_url, asset_metadata FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM multimedia_assets ORDER BY asset_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_type='image' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_metadata->'author' AS author FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_metadata->>'rating' = '5' ORDER BY author;
SELECT asset_name, asset_url, asset_metadata->'created_at' AS created_at FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_metadata->>'likes' > '100' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(asset_metadata->'tags') AS tag_count FROM multimedia_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('image', 'video') ORDER BY tag_count DESC, asset_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM images WHERE image_type='jpg';
SELECT image_size, image_name FROM images WHERE image_type='png' ORDER BY image_size DESC;
SELECT image_name, image_type FROM images WHERE image_size > 1000 ORDER BY image_name ASC;
SELECT image_name, image_path, image_type FROM images JOIN videos ON images.image_name = videos.video_name;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_type = 'jpeg';
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM images WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_resolution = '1080p';
SELECT video_name, video_duration FROM videos WHERE video_duration > 60;
SELECT image_name, image_path, video_name, video_path FROM images JOIN videos ON images.image_id = videos.video_id;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, file_name, file_size FROM images WHERE file_format='JPEG';
SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM images ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_size, upload_date FROM images WHERE file_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM videos ORDER BY duration DESC, upload_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM images ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT file_name, file_format FROM videos WHERE resolution = '1080p' AND duration > 120;
SELECT image_id, file_name, upload_date FROM images WHERE file_format = 'JPEG';
SELECT file_name, resolution, duration FROM videos WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT metadata_id, asset_id, tag FROM metadata WHERE tag LIKE '%nature%' ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_url FROM images WHERE image_size > 100;
SELECT image_description FROM images WHERE image_size < 50;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_duration > 120;
SELECT video_url, video_description FROM videos WHERE video_duration < 60;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_url, image_description FROM images WHERE image_size > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM image_metadata WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_url, video_duration FROM videos ORDER BY video_duration DESC;
SELECT i.image_url, m.location, v.video_description FROM images i JOIN image_metadata m ON i.image_id = m.image_id JOIN videos v ON v.video_id = m.video_id;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_name = 'Nature';
SELECT video_name, video_url FROM videos WHERE video_name LIKE '%Tutorial%';
SELECT image_name, image_metadata FROM images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT video_id, video_name, video_tags.tag_name FROM videos JOIN video_tags ON videos.video_id = video_tags.tag_id;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_url FROM images WHERE image_name = 'example';
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_metadata FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT video_name, video_url, video_metadata FROM videos WHERE video_name LIKE '%video%';
SELECT it.tag_name, i.image_name FROM image_tags it JOIN images i ON it.tag_id = i.image_id;
